column4: hey guys is there going to be any way to use the bbc iplayer with linux
I think its awesome that you can go and download the shows but can't do it if you have linux
where are you having problems downloading shows?
oh, bbc has a special downloader
realplayer is windows as well.. Mplayer should handle it though
amarok follows the "listen in stand alone media player"
how did you get it to work
using the play in external real player, or something
save the .ram file somewhere, add mplayer before the address, then 'sh filename.ram'
didn't know that even existed for linux
